HELP_CENTER_TAB.TITLE: How can we help you ?
HELP_CENTER_TAB.NO_RESULT: We found no answers to your question yet. Please send us a message using the button on the right.

1.QUESTION: How to switch from 2D to 3D view?
1.ANSWER: You can switch from 2D to 3D view by clicking on the first button in the toolbar on the left of your screen.

2.QUESTION: How to switch from 3D to 2D view?
2.ANSWER: You can switch from 3D to 2D view by clicking on the second button in the toolbar on the left of your screen.

3.QUESTION: How to move in 3D view?
3.ANSWER: You can use your mouse to move. Use the left button to move and the right button to rotate.

4.QUESTION: How to move in 2D view?
4.ANSWER: You can use your mouse to move. Use the left button to move the view.

5.QUESTION: How to zoom in 3D view?
5.ANSWER: You can use your mouse to zoom. Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

6.QUESTION: How to zoom in 2D view?
6.ANSWER: You can use the 'Zoom' button in the toolbar. A popup will appear where you can zoom in and out.

7.QUESTION: How to draw a wall in 2D view?
7.ANSWER: You can use the 'Draw Wall' button in the toolbar. Your mouse will change to a pencil. Start drawing by clicking on a position with the left button on your mouse. The start of the wall will be created. Click again on another position to set the end of the wall.

8.QUESTION: How to delete a wall in 2D view?
8.ANSWER: You can use the 'Delete Wall' button in the toolbar. Your mouse will change to a cross. Click on a wall to delete it.

9.QUESTION: How to move a wall in 2D view?
9.ANSWER: You can use the 'Selection' button in the toolbar. Your mouse will change to a cross. Click on a wall to move it. Move the mouse and stay pressed on the left button to move the wall.

10.QUESTION: How to change the unit of measure?
10.ANSWER: You can change the unit of measure in the 'Settings' menu, available in the toolbar.

11.QUESTION: How to display measurements in 2D view?
11.ANSWER: You can display measurements in the 'Settings' menu, available in the toolbar.

12.QUESTION: How to add a furniture?
12.ANSWER: You can add a furniture by clicking on the 'Add Furniture' button in the toolbar. A popup will appear where you can search for a furniture. Click on the furniture you want to add and click on the 'Add' button.
